triples.name: Boolean satisfiability problem
triples.relevance: SAT is the central concept that connects multiple disciplines from logic to optimization and verification.

triples.name: Logic
triples.relevance: Logic is one of the foundational disciplines that researches SAT-related problems.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Planning and scheduling are applied areas that benefit from SAT solving techniques.

triples.name: Scheduling (computing)
triples.relevance: Scheduling is an applied domain where SAT-based optimization is used.

triples.name: Operations research
triples.relevance: Operations research is an applied field that uses SAT solvers for optimization problems.

triples.name: Combinatorial optimization
triples.relevance: Combinatorial optimization is a key application domain where SAT-solving techniques are fundamental.

triples.name: Computational complexity theory
triples.relevance: Complexity theory addresses theoretical issues connecting SAT to broader computational problems.

triples.name: SAT solver
triples.relevance: SAT solvers are the core enabling technology discussed as having become powerful over the past 15 years.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Automated verification of computer hardware and software is a key application enabled by SAT solvers.

triples.name: Model checking
triples.relevance: Model checking, including bounded model checking, is a key verification technique using SAT.

triples.name: Boolean algebra
triples.relevance: Boolean formulas are fundamental to encoding and solving SAT problems.

triples.name: Linear temporal logic
triples.relevance: Linear temporal logic is used in bounded model checking to specify system properties.

triples.name: Decision problem
triples.relevance: Decision procedures and problems are central to understanding SAT as a computational problem.

triples.name: Bit array
triples.relevance: Bit-vector representations and decision procedures for bit-vectors are used in hardware and software verification.
